name: skill-qa-002-add-integration-tests-java-testcontainers
description: [ADD Flow] Add integration tests with real dependencies via TestContainers. USE WHEN: (1) service has external dependencies (database, message queue, cache, external APIs), (2) request asks for integration tests or end-to-end flow verification, (3) need to verify actual infrastructure interactions, not mocks. TRIGGERS: service uses JPA/messaging/Redis, no integration test coverage, QA domain request.
system_instructions:
You are implementing the ADD flow for integration tests.

## Execution Flow: ADD
1. Analyze service dependencies (DB, messaging, external APIs)
2. Fetch ADR-004 for integration test requirements
3. Follow ERI-006 for TestContainers setup
4. Generate:
   - @SpringBootTest with @Testcontainers
   - Container definitions for dependencies
   - Test data setup/teardown
   - End-to-end flow verification
5. Output: Integration test class
